text: Vuga uti:- mbega ndababwire uwuzoba afise impembo yiwe mbi cane gusumba ibi vyose imbere y’Imana? Ni mubo Imana izoba yavumye n’ukuba shavurira n’ukugira abandi kuba nk’inkende n’ingurube, n’ugusenga amashetani, abo nibo bantu bafise ivyicaro vyabo bibi cane n’abazimiye cane munzira igororotse
